history.remoteMessage: This example is shown for reference and can't be deleted. When you chat with AI or friends, your own learning data will be collected here.

last_ai_chat.start_ai_chat: Tap to start chatting with AI

step1.title: Find study partners
step1.desc: Browse online/offline posts and meet friends. Chat with AI for instant grammar checks.

step2.title: Edit your profile
step2.desc: Tap your picture to view and edit profile info.

step3.title: Filter by topics
step3.desc: Swipe the topic slider or tap the list icon to customise visible topics.

step4.title: Advanced filters
step4.desc: Use the filter icon to narrow down posts by distance, recurrence and more.

step5.title: AI quiz & chat
step5.desc: Try the dynamic AI 4-choice quiz or role-play chat to boost your language skills.

step6.title: Create a post
step6.desc: Share your own meetup or question with the community.

step1.title: Real-time Conversation Analysis
step1.desc: Tap this button to check your live conversations in your real meetups.

step2.title: Track Your Progress
step2.desc: Quickly see your language-learning stats at a glance.

step3.title: Discover & Stay Informed
step3.desc: Find nearby learning meetups and all your important notifications here.

step1.title: Choose your quiz type
step1.desc: Select Vocabulary, Grammar, or Expression at the top to start that quiz.

step2.title: Change language & mode
step2.desc: Tap the language button to switch languages. For Grammar/Expression you can also switch modes.

step3.title: Generate a new quiz
step3.desc: Hit ‚ÄúGenerate Quiz‚Äù and wait while we build your quiz from saved study data.

step1.title: Practice by Tab
step1.desc: Select a tab to switch between vocabulary, grammar, and expression practice.

step2.title: Change Language
step2.desc: Tap here to change the language you want to study.

step3.title: Refresh Words
step3.desc: Press this refresh button to select new words tailored to your level.

step4.title: Card/List View
step4.desc: Switch between card view and list view for vocabulary.

step5.title: Saved Words
step5.desc: Toggle to see only your saved (bookmarked) words.

step6.title: Word Card Actions
step6.desc: Tap a word card to see its meaning in your language. Mark words as known or unknown to adjust your learning level.

step1.title: Select Your Chat Type
step1.desc: At the very top, you can easily switch between Personal Chat, Buddy Group Chat, and Regional Chat by tapping the toggle. Choose the type of chat that suits your purpose!

step2.title: AI Chat ‚Äî Your Study Partner
step2.desc: At the top of your personal chat list is AI Chat. This is the heart of the app! Here, you can have real conversations with AI, practice speaking, and instantly take personalized quizzes based on your chats.

step3.title: Chat with Friends & Learn Together
step3.desc: Below the AI Chat, you‚Äôll see all your personal chats with friends. You can add or remove friends anytime through 'Settings > Manage Friends'. To start a chat with a friend, just use this list or go to 'Settings > Manage Friends'. Practice languages together and make learning social and fun!

step4.title: Buddy Group Chats ‚Äî Study as a Team
step4.desc: In the Buddy tab, you‚Äôll find all your group chats. Buddy groups are for learning and practicing together with a team. You can create or join buddy groups from the Search page or from 'Settings > Manage Buddies'. Team up with others and share your language journey!

step5.title: Regional Chat ‚Äî Meet People Nearby
step5.desc: In Regional Chat, you can join conversations with people near your current location. It‚Äôs a great way to make new friends and discover local communities. You might even find new language partners in your area!

step1.title: Fine-tune your AI chat
step1.desc: Tap the ‚ÄúAI +‚Äù button to open detailed controls: set difficulty, topics, voice chat, or role-play options.

step2.title: Role-play with live speech
step2.desc: Choose a situation chip on the right. When Voice Chat is ON, simply speak and the AI will act out the scene with you.

step3.title: Track your learning points
step3.desc: Every time a Grammar or Expression is saved, the counters here go up. You can review them later in the Learning or Quiz pages.

step4.title: Set check-language & auto-check
step4.desc: Pick which language the grammar checker should use. Auto-check is ON by default but you can toggle it here any time.

step5.title: Multiple-choice quizzes (AI only)
step5.desc: This switch gives you 4-choice quizzes based on your AI conversation. It‚Äôs available only in AI chats.

step6.title: Edit or delete a message
step6.desc: Long-press on any bubble you sent to revise or remove it. Handy for fixing mistakes before they‚Äôre checked!

step7.title: Send text or speak
step7.desc: Type and tap the paper-plane icon to send. If the field is empty you‚Äôll see a mic: tap it to start voice chat. The icon turns color while active.

step1.title: Create Offline & Online Language Meetups
step1.desc: Start your own language meetup‚Äîeither in-person or online. This is where you create and launch your group.

step2.title: Choose Topic & Name Your Meetup
step2.desc: Pick a topic for your meetup and set a title. For example: 'Morning English Study', 'French Caf√© Group', etc.

step3.title: Select Meetup Time
step3.desc: Choose the date and time for your event. You can host a one-time meetup or set up a regular, repeating group.

step4.title: Choose the Meetup Location
step4.desc: Look at the map and tap the central pin icon to set your location. The star-shaped pin will move there, and that spot will be saved as your meetup place.

step5.title: Select Meetup Language
step5.desc: Choose the language you‚Äôll use or want to practice in your group. Pick any language you like.

step6.title: Let AI Write the Post for You
step6.desc: If you‚Äôre not sure what to write, just let AI automatically create the meetup post with one tap.

step7.title: Upload & Manage Your Meetup
step7.desc: Tap ‚ÄòUpload‚Äô to post your group. You can find and edit your posts anytime from the home screen or your profile, and save drafts to finish later.

step1.title: Change your profile image
step1.desc: Tap the button next to your profile photo to update your image. A friendly profile picture helps others remember you!

step2.title: Set your nickname
step2.desc: Tap your nickname to set a unique name. Having your own nickname makes it easier to make friends and learn languages effectively.

step3.title: Select your main language
step3.desc: Choose your main language. The app‚Äôs UI will be displayed in the language you select.

step4.title: Manage your profile privacy
step4.desc: Others can see your profile information like learning languages. If you want to keep your info private, you can turn off account visibility here.

step5.title: Quick Menu features
step5.desc: From the Quick Menu, you can manage your posts, buddies, and friends. Tap the settings icon for more detailed options.

step1.title: Buddy Groups
step1.desc: Buddy groups are communities of users learning languages together. The 'Buddies' tab shows the groups you belong to.

step2.title: Buddy Requests
step2.desc: The 'Requests' tab shows the approval status of any join requests you've made to buddy groups.

step3.title: Search Buddy Groups
step3.desc: In the 'Search' tab, you can look up buddy groups to join.

step4.title: Create a Buddy Group
step4.desc: Tap the island icon at the bottom right to create your own buddy group.

step1.title: Your Friends
step1.desc: Check all users who are your friends here. You can remove a friend or start a chat directly from this list.

step2.title: Friend Requests
step2.desc: See friend requests you've sent or received. You can accept or reject requests, and see their status at a glance.

step1.title: Filter Content
step1.desc: Use the top toggle to filter between Meetups, Buddy Groups, Schools, and Events.

step2.title: Create AI-Generated Meetup
step2.desc: Tap the island icon in the bottom-right to draw a circle. Choose your topic, then tap it again to have AI draft a meetup post based on your selected area and topic.

step1.title: Overview
step1.desc: This page shows an overview of your buddy group.

step2.title: View Posts
step2.desc: Tap the ‚ÄúView Posts‚Äù button to go to the group‚Äôs message board.

step3.title: Manage Join Requests
step3.desc: Handle incoming join requests from users wanting to join your group.

step4.title: Schedules, Notices & Polls
step4.desc: Use the tabs to manage schedules, notifications, and polls with your language-learning buddies.

step1.title: Welcome to your Buddy Board
step1.desc: Here you and your group members can share posts.

step2.title: Filter Your Feed
step2.desc: Tap here to sort or narrow down posts.

step3.title: Choose Topics
step3.desc: Select the topics you're interested in.

step4.title: Browse Posts
step4.desc: Scroll through posts shared by your group.

ugc_policy.title: Community Guidelines & Terms
ugc_policy.intro: This is a community powered by your participation. To help keep it safe and welcoming for everyone, please agree to the following:
points: No objectionable or abusive content, as described in our Terms of Use
Automatic filtering of abusive language and images
You can report harmful or inappropriate posts directly from the post page
You can block or restrict abusive users by visiting their profile page
We commit to respond to valid reports within 24 hours

leave_custom_session_success: Your custom AI session has been ended.
start_ai_language_learning: Start AI language learning with this scenario
smart_limit_reached_message: You've reached the daily limit of 30 smart-mode messages.

homeNew.prompt_learn_5: {{nickname}}, what would you like to express in language next?

error.not_in_cefr: This word is not in the CEFR dataset for this language.
